TopicTitle: KIS / KAS Strusts to conect many parts to make a huge reservatory?

Articles.Content:
i use KIS and KAS, and as i nthe picture, i have one rover / miner at minmus surface, and landed a ore transport ship.Jebediah is on the right ship, while dilsel is on the left. i linkedboth of then with KAS struts (with a conextion point in the ground), and it seems that both turned into one ship so i can pass the ore from one to another.So, is it possible for me to land several ore containers and link everything, so my miner fullfil all of then? that way, no need to dock everything, just to put near.![STpCp2A.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/STpCp2A.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-21T16:31:57Z" title="05/21/2015 04:31  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 21, 2015</time> by nfpinto**

> 
> So, is it possible for me to land several ore containers and link everything, so my miner fullfil all of then?

Actually KAS uses a dedicated part - the pipe end point and to a lesser degree the winches - exactly for this scenario.
Gonna try it. Thank you, sir
Related question: Will the ISRU Convertor in one craft fill fuel tanks in another when they are connected via KAS pipes?
It should. It's a simple docking connection.
